articles.title: Heart attack survivors may have a lower risk of Parkinson's disease - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: People who have had a heart attack may be slightly less likely than people in the general population to develop Parkinson's disease later in life, according to new research published today in the Journal of the American Heart Association, an open access, peer…

articles.title: 2022 Olympics: Canada ousted by Sweden in men's hockey quarterfinals; U.S. eliminated by Slovakia - The Athletic
